item.title: ACSS Surveillance Processor TCAS II Functionality (STC ST02053LA) – Traffic Alert (TA) Display System (Center Pedestal TCAS Display) (EFB Installed)

numlitem.para: RA visual display and audio functions are operative, and
En route or approach procedures do not require its use.

placard.para: Placard Center Pedestal TCAS Display "TA INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
Placard TA Position of Transponder Control Panel "INOP".
